title: Gate revenues in sports worldwide by region 2015
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 4 lines denoting North America, EMEA, Asia Pacific, and Latin America. The y axis indicates the Gate revenues in billion U.S. dollars and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall North America, EMEA, and Asia Pacific are gradually increasing, Latin America is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Gate revenues in billion U.S. dollars in descending order is: 1. EMEA, 2. North America, 3. Asia Pacific, and lastly, 4. Latin America.
Throughout the period, EMEA generally had the highest Gate revenues in billion U.S. dollars relative to others with an average of 16.76, and it reached its maximum at 2015 with a value of 18.31.
Followed by North America which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 16.0 Gate revenues in billion U.S. dollars,reaching its highest point  at 2015 with a value of 17.8.
The botommost line, Latin America,  has a mean of 1.79, and peaked at 2014.
